column6: act
column7: prompt

column6: 单词释义和例句
column7: 给出单词“[word]”的定义（先英文，后接中文翻译）和例句（先英文，后接中文翻译）。

column6: 单词搭配和例句
column7: 给出单词“[word]”的常见搭配（先英文，后接中文翻译）和例句（先英文，后接中文翻译）。

column6: 英汉/汉英翻译
column7: 把后面的文本翻译为[英语/汉语]: [text]。

column6: 用中英文回答问题
column7: [prompt]用英语和汉语回应。

column6: 长难句分析及难词释义
column7: 分析下面的句子的句子结构，用表格的形式展示，最后给出中文翻译和难词释义：[句子]

column6: 列出与雅思作文题目相关的学术词汇
column7: List [number] academic words or collocations which might be used in an IELTS essay for the following writing prompt: [prompt]

column6: 用上面的学术词汇造句
column7: give one English example sentence for each of the above, followed by their Chinese translation.

column6: 使用上面的学术词汇写一篇雅思范文
column7: Write a model IELTS essay using the above words/collocations to the above prompt, labeling the above words/collocations with []

column6: 列出雅思写作常见话题及子话题
column7: List common topics and subtopics of IELTS writing task two.

column6: 列出与雅思作文常见的子话题相关的学术词汇
column7: List [number] academic words or collocations related to the subtopic "[subtopic ]", followed with their Chinese translation.

column6: 用上面的学术词汇造句
column7: Give one English example sentence for each of the above , followed by their Chinese translation.

column6: 创建练习题(步骤1：列出话题相关学术类词汇)
column7: List [number] academic words or collocations related to the subtopic "[subtopic ]", followed with their Chinese translation.

column6: 创建练习题(步骤2：创建练习题)
column7: Create a multiple choice quiz and fill-in-the-blank quiz for the above words/collocations.

column6: 制定学习计划
column7: Create a one-week study plan for IELTS writing，I have 30 minutes every day to study.

column6: 给指定的雅思题目写范文
column7: Write a model IELTS essay to the following prompt: [prompt]

column6: 给指定的雅思题目写提纲
column7: Write an outline to the following IELTS writing prompt: [prompt]

column6: 给指定的雅思题目并按指定提纲写雅思范文
column7:
Write a model IELTS essay to the following IELTS writing prompt and according to the following outline:
prompt: [prompt]
outline: [outline]

column6: 以指定的立场写雅思范文
column7: Write a model IELTS essay to the following prompt with the position that [position]:  [prompt]

column6: 用更学术的风格改写
column7: Rewrite it in a more academic style

column6: 用某作家/杂志/报纸的风格改写
column7: Rewrite it in the style of [writer/magazine/newspaper]

column6: 用更高级/简单的词汇改写
column7: Rewrite it using more advanced/simplified language

column6: 列出某现象/趋势的优点和缺点
column7: List the benefits and drawbacks of [trend/phenomenon]

column6: 列出支持和反对某观点的理由
column7: List the arguments for and against the opinion that [opinion]

column6: 列出某问题/现象的原因和解决方法
column7: List the causes of and solutions to the issue/phenomenon that [issue/phenomenon]

column6: 论点的解释，扩展和支持
column7: Explain, extend and support the idea: [idea]

column6: 论点的举例论证
column7: Use an example to support the idea: [idea]

column6: 同义改写表达和句子
column7: List [n] ways to rephrase/rewrite : [expression/sentence]

column6: 语法/拼写检查纠错
column7: Identify, explain and correct the grammar/spelling errors in the following text : [text]

column5: 语法/拼写检查纠错(表格)(4-1-b)
column6: 以表格形式进行语法/拼写检查纠错
column7: Identify, explain and correct the grammar/spelling errors in the format of table in the following text : [text]

column6: 文本润色
column7: Polish the following text: [text]

column6: 文本插入
column7: Insert content in the bracket in the following text:  [before-text] () [after-text]

column6: 文本词汇多样性提升
column7: Rewrite the following text using a wider range of vocabulary : [text]

column6: 文本连贯衔接提升
column7: Improve the coherence and cohesion in the following text: [text]

column6: 文本句型多样性提升
column7: Rewrite the following text using a wider range of complex sentence structure: [text]

column6: 按照雅思官方评分标准对作文分项批改
column7: Act as an IELTS examiner, and rate the following IELTS essay, please point out its problems in categories of Task Response, Coherence and cohesion, Lexical resource, and Grammatical Range and Accuracy; and give corresponding corrections and improvements; and a band score from 0~9: [essay]

column6: 用2+1框架写雅思大作文开始段
column7:
This is an IELTS writing prompt:
[prompt]

Now you need to write a two-sentence, around 40-word introduction as per the template below:
[template]

column6: 用2+1框架写雅思大作文主体段
column7:
Below is an introduction of an IELTS essay: 
[introduction]
Now, write two body paragraphs according to the following template:
[template]

column6: 用2+1框架写雅思大作文结尾段
column7:
Below is an introduction and body of an IELTS essay: 
“[introduction + body]”
Now, write a one-sentence conclusion summarizing the main ideas and restate the position if applicable.

column6: 用2+1框架写雅思大作文全文
column7:
This is an IELTS writing prompt:
[prompt]
Now, write an essay according to the following template:
[template]

column6: 阅读:文章疑难词句解释(中英对照)
column7: Explain what “[word/expression/sentence]”means in the following article in both English and Chinese: [article]

column5: 阅读:疑难单词/词组列表释义(6-2)
column6: 阅读:疑难单词/词组列表释义(中英对照)
column7: Prepare vocabulary notes explaining words and phrases that might be difficult for intermediate learners of English to understand in the following article in both English and Chinese : [article]

column6: 文章翻译
column7: Translate the following article into Chinese： [article]

column5: 阅读:文章逐句难词释义和整句翻译(6-4)
column6: 阅读:文章逐句难词释义和整句翻译
column7: Display the following article sentence by sentence. First show the English sentence, then the vocabulary notes in Chinese for difficult words and phrases in that sentence, and finally the Chinese translation of that sentence. Do this for the entire article ： [article]

column6: 雅思口语Part 1/2/3问题
column7:
Act as a Chinese IELTS candidate sitting in the speaking test,  please answer the following questions in English. The speaking time should be around 3~4 minutes.
[Part 1/2/3 questions]

column5: 定制化回答雅思口语问题(7-4)
column6: 定制化回答雅思口语问题
column7:
Act as a Chinese IELTS candidate sitting in the speaking test,  please answer the following question in English with requirements below. The speaking time should be around [n] minutes.
question : [question]
requirements : [requirements]

column5: 雅思口语语音对练(作为考生)(7-5-a)
column6: 雅思口语语音对练(作为考生)
column7: Act as an IELTS speaking examiner, I am the candidate. You will ask me some common IELTS speaking questions, one question each time. Now please ask me the first question.

column5: 雅思口语语音对练(作为考官)(7-5-b)
column6: 雅思口语语音对练(作为考官)
column7: Act as an IELTS candidate sitting for the speaking test, assume [your profile]. I am the examiner , and I will ask you some questions one by one; please try your best to answer them. The first question is : [question]
